name: catalog_attendee_connections
description:
Lists the sessions of a participant.

Retrieves all sessions associated with the specified participant, with optional
filtering and pagination. Results are sorted by join time in ascending order.

participant_id.description: The parent participant resource name (participant ID).

session_filter_criteria.description:
An optional filter string to apply to the sessions. The filter is applied
to the string representation of each session object.

maximum_sessions_to_return.description: The maximum number of sessions to return per page.

pagination_marker.description: The token for continued list pagination, representing the start index.

name: enumerate_all_meeting_attendees
description: Lists participants of a conference record.

parent_conference_resource_name.description: The parent conference record resource name.

page_item_limit.description: The maximum number of participants to return.

continuation_token.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: enumerate_all_meeting_recordings
description: Lists the recordings of a conference.

results_per_page.description: The maximum number of recordings to return.

pagination_cursor.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: establish_new_virtual_room
description:
Creates a new meeting space.

This function adds a new meeting space to the database with the specified
name and content details.

new_room_label.description: The name of the new space. Must be a non-empty string.

meetingCode.description: A unique code for joining the meeting

meetingUri.description: A URI that can be used to join the meeting

accessType.description: The access level for the space

room_initial_properties.description: A dictionary containing the details of the new space.

name: fetch_conference_room_info
description:
Gets details about a meeting space.

Retrieves comprehensive information about a specific meeting space.

room_name_to_query.description: The name of the space to retrieve.

name: fetch_meeting_details_by_id
description:
Gets a conference record by conference ID.

Retrieves detailed information about a specific conference record.

conference_record_resource_name.description: Resource name of the conference to retrieve.

name: fetch_single_transcript_segment
description: Gets a transcript entry by entry ID.

name: find_attendee_session_by_id
description:
Gets a participant session by session ID.

Retrieves detailed information about a specific participant session.

session_resource_id.description: Resource name (ID) of the session to retrieve.

name: find_transcript_by_name
description: Gets a transcript by transcript ID.

name: get_all_transcript_segments
description: Lists the entries of a transcript.

page_limit.description: The maximum number of entries to return.

next_page_token_value.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: get_all_transcripts_for_conference
description: Lists the transcripts of a conference.

next_page_cursor.description: The token for continued list pagination.

results_limit_per_page.description: The maximum number of transcripts to return.

name: modify_conference_room
description:
Updates details about a meeting space.

This function modifies the specified fields of an existing meeting space. Only fields
that are included in the update_mask will be changed.

space_identifier.description: The name of the space to update.

field_modifications.description:
A dictionary containing the fields to update
and their new values. If provided, known fields like 'id', 'meetingCode',
'meetingUri', 'accessType', 'entryPointAccess' must adhere to their
expected types (typically string). Additional arbitrary fields and their
values are also permitted, aligning with the Pydantic model SpaceUpdateMaskModel.

name: retrieve_meeting_history_list
description:
Lists the conference records.

Retrieves a list of conference records with optional filtering and pagination.
By default, results are ordered by start time in descending order (most recent first).

search_query_filter.description:
An optional filter string to apply to the records. The filter is applied
to the string representation of each record object.

pagination_start_token.description: An optional token for pagination, representing the start index.

max_records_per_page.description: An optional maximum number of records to return per page.

name: retrieve_meeting_recording_by_id
description: Gets a recording by recording ID.

name: terminate_current_conference
description:
Ends an active conference in a meeting space, if one exists.

This function removes the activeConference field from the specified space,
effectively marking any active conference as ended.
